question: I was recently diagnosed with a severe yeast infection, I have type II diabetes.  I was given Diflucan, take one pill twice a week for 4 weeks and nystatin cream to apply to area.  It is only on the outside of vagina.  But it is so painful and extremely itchy, also very swollen.  I have take the two pills this week, putting cream on religiously and still not one bit of relief.  This is my first yeast infection and just wanting to know how long before I start getting relief?  It has even popped up on the outside of my lips on my face as little sores.
title: Yeast Infection
